text: Wimbledon steward David Spearing (wearing a black hat) at Wimbledon 2016 David Spearing is the longest serving steward at the Wimbledon Championships. Spearing can be found in the player's box during the Wimbledon Championships wearing a trademark black Stetson hat. Spearing has attended Wimbledon for over 45 years.Mackrell, Daniel. "Who is the man in the hat at Wimbledon and what does he do?", Metro.co.uk, July 5, 2019. Retrieved January 2, 2020 He lives in Abu Dhabi where he runs a structural engineering company. ==References== Category:The Championships, Wimbledon Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
